name: evqueue-frontend-react
description: evQueue scheduler frontend, fully written in react JS

scripts.build: node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js htdocs/js/src --out-dir htdocs/js/dist --presets react && node_modules/sass/sass.js --no-source-map htdocs/styles/src/ui.scss htdocs/styles/ui.css

author: Thibault Kummer
